education.degree: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence
Bachelor of Technology in Electronics and Communications

work_experience.responsibilities: Contributed to an R&D project for a healthcare client focused on real-time image processing using OpenCV and Scikit-Image., Developed and integrated CNNs with TensorFlow and Keras for pattern and anomaly detection in medical images., Built and maintained an end-to-end web application for an e-commerce client using MERN stack., Analyzed sales data and implemented a Random Forest model that predicted customer demand, resulting in a 12.8% increase in sales., Utilized AWS EC2 for scalable hosting, deployed applications with Docker, managed AWS RDS for secure database, and implemented S3 and CloudFront for efficient asset storage.
Developed and tested Android applications using JAVA to improve functionality and user experience.

skills: Python, Java, C, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Django, React, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, Keras, Generative AI, NLG, LLMs, React, Fast API, Rest API, Flask, Gradio Framework, MySQL, Microsoft Access, AWS
